name: Hypership Out of Control 2
description: Space is a dangerous placed for even the most seasoned starship pilot, full of asteroids, multicolored floating blocks, space mines, and sweet sweet coins. Space is even more dangerous when you your accelerator is stuck to the floor and your brakes are out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
